```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
pols_df = 
  read_csv("fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "mon", "day"), sep = "-") |>
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year), 
          mon = as.numeric(mon), 
          day = as.numeric(day)) |>
  mutate(mon = month.abb[mon]) |>
  pivot_longer(
      cols = c("prez_dem", "prez_gop"),
      names_to = "prez",
      values_to = "president") |>
  select(-day)
```
